reporting.reporttable.TableQuery: SELECT DocumentName AS 'Name', NodeAliasPath AS 'Alias path', FirstName + ' ' + LastName + ' (' + UserName +')' AS 'Last modified by', StepDisplayName AS 'Current workflow step' FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined LEFT JOIN CMS_User ON View_CMS_Tree_Joined.DocumentModifiedByUserID=CMS_User.UserID LEFT JOIN CMS_WorkflowStep ON View_CMS_Tree_Joined.DocumentWorkflowStepID = CMS_WorkflowStep.StepID WHERE View_CMS_Tree_Joined.DocumentWorkflowStepID IN (SELECT StepID FROM CMS_WorkflowStep WHERE (StepType NOT IN (6, 11, 100, 101))) AND (NodeSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) ORDER BY NodeAliasPath
